Description:
Rule to detect the Hybrid Connection Manager service running on an endpoint.

Author: Roberto Rodriguez (Cyb3rWard0g), OTR (Open Threat Research)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: HybridConnectionManager Service Running
Query: sourcetype='windows-microsoft-servicebus-client' eql select * from _source_ where ((eventid = '40300' or eventid = '40301' or eventid = '40302') and (log like '%hybridconnection%' or log like '%sb://%' or log like '%servicebus.windows.net%' or log like '%hybridconnectionmanage%'))
